name: AugustSmartHome
0:
”Alexa, unlock the front door.”
”Alexa, is the front door locked?”
”Alexa, show the front door.”
skdetail:
Smart Home Skill. This skill may share device information with Amazon. Learn more.
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Developer Terms of Use
des:
Use Alexa to control your August Smart Lock and show events from your August Doorbell Cam. 

Alexa also allows you to:
- lock/unlock your door* and check your lock’s status
- view motion events captured by your August Doorbell Cam
- hear announcements on your Echo device when someone rings your August Doorbell Cam
- use routines to play sounds or control other smart devices following doorbell cam events

*To unlock your door, just set a 4-digit code in the Alexa app. Go to the Smart Home section, select your August Smart Lock, and enable the 'Unlock by voice' and '4-digit voice code' settings

With a August Doorbell Cam, you can see, hear and speak to people in front of your doorbell from your FireTVs, Echo Show, Echo Spot, Echo Speakers (such as Echo, Echo Plus and Echo Dot). Simply say:
“Alexa, answer the front door.”
“Alexa, talk to the back door.”

To view activity from your August Doorbell Cam, say:
“Alexa, show the front door.”

To stop your August feed, say:
“Alexa, hide the front door.”
“Alexa, go home.”
“Alexa, stop.”

Connecting Your August Products to Alexa
Find information about connecting Smart Home devices at support.august.com/integrating-with-amazon-alexa-r1l0L8yCOM

Required August Products
-To control an August Smart Lock with Alexa, you'll need the August Smart Lock/Smart Lock Pro and either an August Connect or any August Doorbell Cam to connect the lock to Wi-Fi

Additional Support
For additional help, please visit support.august.com or email support@august.com
